docs.title: 主页
docs.text:
欢迎来到联机大厅API文档站！

Note

这里是主页，不妨在左边的目录看看有哪些文档可以帮助你。

docs.title: 前言
docs.text: 此文档站为 非官方 的文档站点，您可以前往官方文档站点支持官方。

docs.title: 官方网站
docs.text:
• 联机大厅

  • API文档

docs.title: 发送请求
docs.text: 向http://mc.miaaoo.com/list发送GET请求，请求参数为空。

docs.title: 示例代码
docs.text:
import requests

response = requests.get('http://mc.miaaoo.com/list')

print(response.text)

Tip

当返回状态码为 200 或 201 时，表示请求成功，返回的数据为房间列表的JSON格式字符串。

docs.title: 响应数据
docs.text:
返回的数据为房间列表的JSON格式字符串，包含以下字段：

  • results：房间列表，每个房间包含以下字段：
    • sessionRef：一个包含着会话ID的对象
      • name：会话ID
    • createTime：创建时间，为 ISO 8601 格式的字符串
    • id：房间UUID
    • customProperties：房间的自定义属性，包含以下字段：
      • hostName：房主的XBOX ID
      • ownerId：房主的XUID
      • version：房间版本
      • worldName：世界名称
      • worldType：游戏模式，为Survival/Adventure/Creative/Spectator中的一个
      • MemberCount：房间内玩家数量
      • MaxMemberCount：房间最大玩家数量
      • BroadcastSetting：房间广播设置，3：好友的好友，2：仅好友，1：仅邀请，只有值为3的房间才能让外人加入
      • isHardcore：是否为极限模式
    • roomfrom：房间来源，目前有以下值：2：MultiMC23，3：gouhope，4：HelloMC25，5：HelloMC25a

docs.title: 示例
docs.text:
{
    "results": [
        {
            "sessionRef": {
                "name": "1234567890"
            },
            "createTime": "2021-08-17T10:00:00.000Z",
            "id": "12345678-1234-123456789012",
            "customProperties": {
                "hostName": "XboxID",
                "ownerId": "1234567890123456",
                "version": "1.16.5",
                "worldName": "world",
                "worldType": "Survival",
                "MemberCount": 1,
                "MaxMemberCount": 10,
                "BroadcastSetting": 3,
                "isHardcore": false
            },
            "roomfrom": 2
        },
        ...
    ]
}

docs.title: 请求
docs.text: 向 https://api.miaaoo.com/getxuid?gametag={gametag} 发送一个GET请求，其中{gametag}是你的XBOX ID。

docs.title: 示例
docs.text: https://api.miaaoo.com/getxuid?gametag=Steve

docs.title: 响应
docs.text: 如果请求成功，服务器将返回一个16位纯数字的XUID。

docs.title: 发送请求
docs.text:
向http://mc.miaaoo.com/join发送POST请求，请求参数如下：

  • version：版本号，目前为1.0.0
  • joininformation：一个包含了房间信息的对象
    • addid：你添加了哪位好友就填对应好友的id数字，在获取房间列表章节已提到
    • roomfrom：在获取房间列表章节获得的roomfrom
    • roomid：房间UUID，在获取房间列表章节获得的roomid
    • sessionname：在获取房间列表章节获得的sessionRef对象中的name字段
  • invitecontrol：一个包含了邀请控制信息的对象
    • userxuid：你的xuid，可在获取xuid章节获得
    • verifycode：邀请功能解锁码，需要联系客服并发送自己的xuid获取

docs.title: 请求体示例
docs.text:
{
    version: "1.0.0",
    joininformation: {
        addid: "1",
        roomfrom: "1",
        roomid: "1234567890",
        sessionname: "sessionname"
    },
    invitecontrol: {
        userxuid: "1234567890",
        verifycode: "123456"
    }
}

Tip

当返回状态码为 200 时，表示请求成功.

docs.title: Preface
docs.text: This documentation site is an unofficial resource. You may visit the official documentation site to support the official platform.

docs.title: Official Websites
docs.text:
• Online Lobby
  • API Documentation

docs.title: Send Request
docs.text: Send a GET request to http://mc.miaaoo.com/list with empty request parameters.

docs.title: Example Code
docs.text:
import requests

response = requests.get('http://mc.miaaoo.com/list')

print(response.text)

Tip

When the returned status code is 200 or 201, it indicates a successful request. The returned data is a JSON-formatted string containing the room list.

docs.title: Response Data
docs.text:
The returned data is a JSON-formatted string containing the room list, including the following fields:

  • results: List of rooms, where each room contains the following fields:
    • sessionRef: An object containing the session ID
      • name: Session ID
    • createTime: Creation time in ISO 8601 formatted string
    • id: Room UUID
    • customProperties: Custom properties of the room, including the following fields:
      • hostName: Host's Xbox ID
      • ownerId: Host's XUID
      • version: Room version
      • worldName: World name
      • worldType: Game mode, which can be Survival/Adventure/Creative/Spectator
      • MemberCount: Number of players in the room
      • MaxMemberCount: Maximum number of players allowed in the room
      • BroadcastSetting: Room broadcast settings, 3: Friends of friends, 2: Friends only, 1: Invitation only. Only rooms with a value of 3 can be joined by external players.
      • isHardcore: Whether it is Hardcore mode
    • roomfrom: Room source, currently with the following values: 2: MultiMC23, 3: gouhope, 4: HelloMC25, 5: HelloMC25a

docs.title: Example
docs.text:
{
    "results": [
        {
            "sessionRef": {
                "name": "1234567890"
            },
            "createTime": "2021-08-17T10:00:00.000Z",
            "id": "12345678-1234-123456789012",
            "customProperties": {
                "hostName": "XboxID",
                "ownerId": "1234567890123456",
                "version": "1.16.5",
                "worldName": "world",
                "worldType": "Survival",
                "MemberCount": 1,
                "MaxMemberCount": 10,
                "BroadcastSetting": 3,
                "isHardcore": false
            },
            "roomfrom": 2
        },
        ...
    ]
}

docs.title: Request
docs.text: Send a GET request to https://api.miaaoo.com/getxuid?gametag={gametag}, where {gametag} is your Xbox ID.

docs.title: Example
docs.text: https://api.miaaoo.com/getxuid?gametag=Steve

docs.title: Response
docs.text: If the request is successful, the server will return a 16-digit numeric XUID.

docs.title: Send Request
docs.text:
Send a POST request to http://mc.miaaoo.com/join with the following request parameters:

  • version: Version number, currently 1.0.0
  • joininformation: An object containing room information
    • addid: Enter the ID of the friend you added (as mentioned in the room list section)
    • roomfrom: Value obtained from the room list section
    • roomid: Room UUID obtained from the room list section
    • sessionname: The name field from the sessionRef object obtained in the room list section
  • invitecontrol: An object containing invitation control information
    • userxuid: Your XUID (can be obtained from the XUID section)
    • verifycode: Invitation unlock code, which needs to be obtained by contacting customer support with your XUID

docs.title: Request Body Example
docs.text:
{
    version: "1.0.0",
    joininformation: {
        addid: "1",
        roomfrom: "1",
        roomid: "1234567890",
        sessionname: "sessionname"
    },
    invitecontrol: {
        userxuid: "1234567890",
        verifycode: "123456"
    }
}

Tip

When the returned status code is 200, it indicates a successful request.
